tree.name: John Konchar
tree.tradeDescription: 8-player mega-trade: came with JJJ, Williams Jr., Landale from MEM
tree.note: Purdue-Fort Wayne guard, undrafted grinder, excellent role player

assetsGivenUp.name: Walter Clayton Jr.
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Draft-night trade: Jazz sent Will Riley (#21), Jamir Watkins (#43), 2031 2nd, 2032 2nd to Washington for Clayton (#18)
assetsGivenUp.note: Florida guard, drafted 18th overall 2025

assetsGivenUp.name: Kyle Anderson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Collins to LAC, Powell to MIA, Anderson and Love to UTA
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward, acquired from Miami in 3-team deal

assetsGivenUp.name: John Collins
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded Rudy Gay and 2026 2nd (MEM own) to Atlanta for Collins
assetsGivenUp.note: Wake Forest forward, acquired from Hawks

assetsGivenUp.name: Rudy Gay
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward, signed as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick (MEM own)
assetsGivenUp.note: Second-round pick traded to Atlanta

assetsGivenUp.name: Taylor Hendricks
assetsGivenUp.note: UCF forward, Jazz drafted 9th overall 2023

assetsGivenUp.name: Georges Niang
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded RJ Luis to Boston for Niang, 2027 2nd, and 2031 2nd
assetsGivenUp.note: Iowa State forward, veteran role player

assetsGivenUp.name: RJ Luis
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed to two-way contract

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 1st Round Pick (more favorable conditional)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Conditional pick from Gobert and Mitchell trades - more favorable of remaining CLE/MIN 2027 picks
assetsGivenUp.note: More favorable conditional 2027 1st (from Gobert/Mitchell trade hauls)

assetsGivenUp.name: Rudy Gobert
assetsGivenUp.note: 3x DPOY, French center, Jazz drafted 27th overall 2013

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 1st Round Pick (via LAL)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team Conley/Russell Westbrook trade - Lakers sent 2027 1st to Jazz
assetsGivenUp.note: Lakers' own 2027 first-round pick, acquired in Conley mega-trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Mike Conley
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: UTA traded Grayson Allen, Jae Crowder, Kyle Korver, Darius Bazley, and 2022 1st (Walker Kessler) to MEM for Mike Conley
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran PG, acquired from Memphis in blockbuster trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Grayson Allen
assetsGivenUp.note: Duke guard, UTA 2018 1st round pick. Sent to MEM for Conley.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jae Crowder
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: UTA sent Rodney Hood to CLE and Joe Johnson to SAC for Crowder, Derrick Rose, and 2024 2nd swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Versatile wing, acquired from Cleveland in 3-team trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Rodney Hood
assetsGivenUp.note: Duke wing, UTA 2014 1st round pick. Sent to CLE for Crowder.

assetsGivenUp.name: Kyle Korver
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: UTA traded Alec Burks, 2020 2nd (Justinian Jessup), and 2021 2nd (Greg Brown III) to CLE for Kyle Korver
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran sharpshooter, acquired from Cleveland

assetsGivenUp.name: Alec Burks
assetsGivenUp.note: Colorado guard, UTA 2011 1st round pick. Sent to CLE for Korver.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2020 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to CLE for Korver

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 2nd Round Pick (via WAS)
assetsGivenUp.note: Washington's 2021 2nd, sent to CLE for Korver

assetsGivenUp.name: 2022 UTA 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: UTA own 2022 1st, sent to MEM for Conley; conveyed as #22 overall (conditional, top-6 protected)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 1st Round Pick (via PHO)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Jazz sent 2025 1st (CLE), 2027 1st (least favorable), 2029 1st (least favorable) to Phoenix for 2031 1st (PHO own)
assetsGivenUp.note: Phoenix's own 2031 first-round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 1st Round Pick (via CLE)
assetsGivenUp.note: Cleveland's own 2025 1st, became Liam McNeeley
